decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (123 - 00- 100 Rev. D, 123 - 00- 101 Rev. D, 123 - 00- 200 Rev. D, 123 - 00- 110 Rev. D, 123 - 00- 111 Rev. D, 123 - 02- 100 Rev. E, 123 - 02- 101 Rev. D, 123 - 02- 200 Rev. D, 123 - 02- 110 Rev. D, 123 - 02- 111 Rev. D, Planning, Heritage, Design and Access Statement prepared by Planning Potential Ltd and dated 16 October 2015, Appendix 1 : Planning Policy context prepared by Planning Potential Ltd and dated 15 October 2015. Received 06 November 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No amplified or other music shall be played in the courtyard or garden of the premises outside the following times: Monday - Sunday between 10.00 - 18.00hrs.
Condition : 4 - The use of the rear garden hereby permitted shall not be carried on outside the following times: Monday - Sunday from 10.00 - 19.00hrs.
Condition : 5 - The glazing bars of the front doors and stall risers hereby permitted shall be timber, to match the materials used in the existing windows and doors of the building.
description: External alterations to shop front and rear courtyard including the erection of a brick means of enclosure to the bin store, to replace the existing wooden fence at the rear
